duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting and assisting customers, filling drink orders, and working the drive-thru.
Advancing career by taking on more responsibilities in other roles, such as Certified Trainer.
Guiding the customer experience and interacting with each customer that visits the Restaurant.
Working in a fast-paced food service environment, working all shifts from opening to closing.
Providing paid training for new Restaurant Cashier team members.
Earning pay increases through additional training, certifications, and performance evaluations.
Being a team player, excellent communicator, and responsible and dependable.
Maintaining casual work attire and flexible scheduling.
Lifting, carrying, pushing or pulling heavy objects up to 50 pounds and cleaning tables, floors, and other areas of the Restaurant.
Taking orders from customers and processing payments efficiently, while following proper safety procedures when handling and/or preparing food.
Showing up to scheduled shifts on time and working under pressure and at a fast pace.
Complying with company policies and providing all customers with quick and friendly service.
